GetSolar – The Trusted Solar Panel Company in Singapore

Unlock your savings while saving the planet. We make the process of getting solar simple for you through our zero-upfront cost plans.

Request A QUOTE

## Protect Your Roof

Excessive heat from the sun can cause warping of your roof. Installing solar panels for your home can thus act as an added shield, preventing direct sunlight and minimising heat influx into your living space.

## Reduce Carbon Footprint​

Solar energy is one of the cleanest forms of energy available as it generates electricity without producing carbon dioxide. With sunny weather all year round, it is also a reliable source of renewable energy for your home.

## Enjoy Cost-Savings

Installing solar panels can help optimise underutilised roof space. Depending on your electricity consumption and roof size, you can enjoy greater cost savings, potentially cutting your electricity bills by up to 80%!

## Why Use Solar Energy?

As one of the leading solar panel companies in Singapore, we are at the forefront of encouraging homeowners to adopt solar panels for their homes. Solar energy, being an accessible source of power in Singapore, aligns perfectly with the vision of a zero-carbon future.

This makes solar energy an optimal solution for transitioning to sustainable energy.

Our solar panel systems can help you save up to 70% on your electricity bills. Our Renewable Energy Certificate (REC) programme also allows you to earn extra income by selling the clean energy your panels generate!

## Switching To Solar Made Easier With GetSolar

As a leading solar panel company in Singapore, we make switching to solar easy for you with our efficient and hassle-free process. We understand that the world of solar technology can be complex, which is why we ensure that most of the work is handled by us. All you need to do is request a quote and our team of experts will guide you through the next steps!

Step 1

Step 2

Step 3

Step 4

Step 5

Step 6

Step 7

Step 1

Step 1

### Generate A Solar Estimate

Start your journey by using our solar calculator to receive a preliminary recommendation of your rooftop solar panel system, based on your roof size, electricity usage and metre configuration. With GetSolar’s solar calculator, receive an instant solar quote and calculate your solar savings when you switch to solar energy.

Get your quote today

Step 2

Step 2

### Consult with a Solar Specialist

After receiving your solar estimate, our solar sales advisors will reach out to gather any additional information and documents needed to design a customised solar panel proposal for your home.

Step 3

Step 3

### Receive a Solar Proposal

Next, you can expect to receive a customised solar panel proposal in your email inbox. On the online advisory call, our sales specialist will guide you through the GetSolar Rent-to-own solar proposal, providing expert advice and answering any questions you have about solar along the way.

Step 4

Step 4

### Confirmatory Site Survey and Contract Signing

Once you express interest in the solar offer, we will conduct a confirmatory site survey to ensure your home is ready for installation and firm up any remaining details. Following this, you will receive an e-signing agreement for your review and confirmation.

Step 5

Step 5

### Installation and Commissioning of Solar Panels

Upon confirmation, our team will initiate the installation process. Once your solar panels and solar inverters are delivered, on-site installation is typically completed within 3 to 5 days . Our team will handle all electrical submissions to SP Group, and once approved, a Licensed Electrical Worker (LEW) will then conduct testing and commissioning before turning on the solar PV system.

Step 6

Step 6

### Start Generating Solar Power

Once certified for operations, you can turn the system on, generating solar power for your household! Any solar energy generated from your solar panel system will now offset your day-time electricity usage, with any excess solar energy being sold back to the grid, and paid out directly into your utility account!

Step 7

Step 7

### Post-Installation Maintenance and Support

Our dedicated team ensures the continued performance and efficiency of your solar panel system through daily remote monitoring of your system as well as routine inspections. These inspections are free for those enrolled in the Rent-To-Own program, while customers who selected the upfront purchase plan will incur a small fee.

## Types of Solar Plans at GetSolar

We are a leading and trusted solar panel company in Singapore, with an unwavering commitment to offering value plans to meet the needs of both homeowners and businesses.

### Solar for Homes

Go solar for your home with Singapore’s first Rent-To-Own solar programme or opt for an upfront purchase plan.

Explore

### Solar for Businesses

Embrace sustainability for your business through a Power Purchase Agreement (PPA) or an upfront purchase plan.

Explore

## Who We Are

Our team of specialists possesses in-depth knowledge of solar panels and solar panel technology. We ensure you have the information needed to make well-informed decisions.

ABOUT US

## Why Choose Us

Discover why thousands of customers trust GetSolar for their energy needs.

Features
**Features** Blogs
**Blogs** Calculator
**Calculator** Chun Hong
**Testimonials** **Know more**

## Frequently Asked Questions

Is it worth installing solar panels for my home?\


In short, yes! Solar panels are a win-win: you save on electricity bills and get paid for the clean energy you contribute back to the grid. Additionally, you’re helping the planet.

In Singapore’s climate where it is sunny all year round, installing solar panels for your home can help you save energy and costs. However, how much you save is dependent on your roof size and site conditions. Find out how much you can potentially save with our solar calculator tool.

Are solar panels a good investment?\


Absolutely! Given Singapore’s rising electricity prices, solar panels are a smart move to cut down on those expensive bills while helping save the planet.

The amount of savings you can enjoy will largely depend on 3 factors:

- Your energy consumption patterns
- Your existing electricity retailer and utility rate
- The number of solar panels that your roof can accommodate

Plus, thanks to Singapore’s energy export structure, you can also earn from selling extra power back to the grid. You’re looking at a payback period of 5-8 years for a system that will last you over 25 years. A pretty solid investment, if you ask us.

You can estimate your potential savings with our solar calculator today!

Are there any grants available for solar installations?\


It depends on the type of property. Here's how it breaks down:

**For homeowners:**

There are currently **no government grants** available for solar panel installation on residential properties in Singapore.

But you can still go solar without the high upfront cost, check out our **Rent-to-Own solar panels** for a more affordable way to get started.

**For businesses:**

If you own or manage a commercial or industrial building, you may qualify for the Green Mark Incentive Scheme for Existing Buildings (GMIS-EB 2.0) offered by the Building and Construction Authority (BCA).

To be eligible:

- Your building must be Green Mark certified
- The level of funding depends on your Green Mark rating
- Other criteria and documentation are also required

It's a useful option for companies planning broader energy efficiency upgrades along side solar.

Can I sell excess solar energy back to the grid?\


Absolutely! You can be compensated for any unused solar energy your system exports to the grid.

If you're connected through **SP Group**, you'll be paid via a rebate that offsets future bills. If you 're using an **Open Electricity Market (OEM)** retailer, you'll receive payments based on the **Wholesale Uniform Singapore Energy Price (USEP)** which can vary between **S$0.10/kWh to S$0.50/kWh**.

‍

Here's how it works depending on your setup:

**For homeowners (SP Group billing):**

- You'll be paid at the regulated tariff **minus grid charges**, which is about **75-80% of what you pay for electricity**(~S$0.22/kWh as of early 2025).
- This appears as a **bill rebate** on your SP Group account.

**For businesses (or OEM users):**

- Export payments are based on **USEP**, which fluctuates daily.
- You'll receive your earnings as a r **emittance cheque** from SP Group.
- You can also request payment via **GIRO** by submitting a form to SP Group.

Learn more about solar export rates.

## Ready to Go Solar?

Contact us

If you have any inquiries or need support, our team of cheerful solar elves is here to assist you! Reach out to us on WhatsApp or drop us a message at support@getsolar.ai, and we’ll be at your service!

## Frequently Asked Questions

[What is the GetSolar Rent-to-Own guarantee?\\
](https://www.getsolar.ai/en-sg/pricing#)

Our Rent-to-Own (RTO) model is a fully-serviced one, and under our GetSolar guarantee, we cover all repairs, maintenance and warranties over your contract period. On top of this, we are also the only company in the country to provide a performance guarantee, where if your system generates less than the amount of solar energy generation that we guarantee, we pay you for the difference.

A 100% fuss-free system at no out-of-pocket costs.

[What is Rent-to-Own Solar?\\
](https://www.getsolar.ai/en-sg/pricing#)

Our Rent-to-Own program in Singapore offers an affordable residential solar solution with no initial costs. We handle everything from installation to ongoing maintenance.

You’ll pay a fixed monthly fee that is generally lower than your current electricity bill, allowing you to start saving from day one. Maintenance includes regular inspections and repairs to ensure optimal system performance, giving you a hassle-free experience.

At the end of the contract, the solar system becomes yours at no additional cost, providing you with a risk-free solar solution.

[Why should I choose Rent-to-own instead of directly purchasing a solar system?\\
](https://www.getsolar.ai/en-sg/pricing#)

If the upfront cost and uncertainty of solar make you hesitate, Rent-to-Own is your solution. It’s a low-to-no upfront cost way to get solar, with guaranteed system performance. We also cover all repairs, servicing and maintenance over the period of your so it’s completely hassle free! GetSolar gives you absolute piece of mind by having our team of experts and professionals look after your system so you don’t have to worry about a thing!

[Can I switch from Rent-to-own to upfront purchase midway?\\
](https://www.getsolar.ai/en-sg/pricing#)

Certainly! If you’re ready to fully own your system, you have the option to do an Early Buyout of the system. In an Early Buyout, you simply pay off your system’s depreciated value, penalty-free to take ownership sooner than the end of the RTO contract.

Do note that the service warranties and free maintenance coverage end with the termination of the contract, but your solar panel and inverter’s product warranties will remain in place.

## Ready to Go Solar?

Contact us

If you have any inquiries or need support, our team of cheerful solar elves is here to assist you! Reach out to us on WhatsApp or drop us a message at support@getsolar.ai, and we’ll be at your service!

Frequently Asked Questions

What is the GetSolar Rent-to-Own guarantee?

Our Rent-to-Own (RTO) model is a fully-serviced one, and under our GetSolar guarantee, we cover all repairs, maintenance and warranties over your contract period. On top of this, we are also the only company in the country to provide a performance guarantee, where if your system generates less than the amount of solar energy generation that we guarantee, we pay you for the difference.

A 100% fuss-free system at no out-of-pocket costs.

What is Rent-to-Own Solar?

Our Rent-to-Own program in Singapore offers an affordable residential solar solution with no initial costs. We handle everything from installation to ongoing maintenance.

You’ll pay a fixed monthly fee that is generally lower than your current electricity bill, allowing you to start saving from day one. Maintenance includes regular inspections and repairs to ensure optimal system performance, giving you a hassle-free experience.

At the end of the contract, the solar system becomes yours at no additional cost, providing you with a risk-free solar solution.

Why should I choose Rent-to-own instead of directly purchasing a solar system?

If the upfront cost and uncertainty of solar make you hesitate, Rent-to-Own is your solution. It’s a low-to-no upfront cost way to get solar, with guaranteed system performance. We also cover all repairs, servicing and maintenance over the period of your so it’s completely hassle free! GetSolar gives you absolute piece of mind by having our team of experts and professionals look after your system so you don’t have to worry about a thing!

Can I switch from Rent-to-own to upfront purchase midway?

Certainly! If you’re ready to fully own your system, you have the option to do an Early Buyout of the system. In an Early Buyout, you simply pay off your system’s depreciated value, penalty-free to take ownership sooner than the end of the RTO contract.

Do note that the service warranties and free maintenance coverage end with the termination of the contract, but your solar panel and inverter’s product warranties will remain in place.

## Our Story

GetSolar: Leading the Green Energy Transformation

GetSolar, formerly Solar AI Technologies, was founded in 2020 to simplify the process of adopting rooftop solar and drive the transition to clean energy across Southeast Asia. Seed-funded by ENGIE, a global leader in renewable energy, our mission is to empower property owners with the tools they need to embrace solar energy, helping to build a sustainable, zero-carbon future.

As part of the green energy transformation, we understand that solar photovoltaics are among the top solutions to reverse climate change, according to Project Drawdown. With an innovative approach to solar sales, GetSolar is making solar energy more accessible, scalable, and affordable for everyone—driving the adoption of impactful projects that create lasting positive change.

## Our Mission & Vision

### Our Vision

Transforming every home and business into a clean energy hub

### Our Mission

To bring clean energy solutions to every home and small-medium business in Asia, starting with solar and expanding into energy storage, management, and trading for a more sustainable tomorrow.

### Accessibility

We believe everyone deserves access to affordable solar energy, enabling individuals and businesses to benefit from renewable energy solutions.

### Sustainability

We are focused on driving long-term environmental impact, reducing carbon footprints, and fostering a cleaner, greener world.

### Innovation

We continuously strive to optimise and modernise the solar acquisition process, ensuring our customers have the best tools and support to make the transition to solar as smooth as possible.

## Our Impact

GetSolar’s contributions to sustainability are tangible, with meaningful results for both our customers and the environment.

## 7,900+ kWp of rooftop solar installed

## 4,300+ tons of annual CO2 reduction

## 185K+ equivalent trees planted

## Awards & Recognition

We’re proud to have received recognition for our work in solar energy and environmental impact. Our efforts to make solar more accessible and affordable have earned us numerous accolades.

# Commercial & Non-Residential Solar Panel Installation

Higher and higher electricity bills? Turn your rooftop into long-term savings. GetSolar offers tailored solar panel installation for commercial and non-residential properties, all with $0 upfront cost, flexible ownership plans, and guaranteed performance.

Whether you manage a business, school, factory, or retail space, we help you make the switch to clean energy seamlessly and affordably.

Get your free quote

## Flexible Solar Plans to Suit Your Property's Needs

Want to avoid upfront costs for solar installation on your commercial or non-residential property? With our Rent-to-Own (RTO) and Power Purchase Agreement (PPA) plans, you can enjoy immediate savings on your electricity bills, without any upfront payment. Prefer to own your system? Our upfront purchase option offers breakeven periods as short as 3 years!

**Bestseller!**

Rent-to-Own (RTO)

Zero upfront cost. Own the system after 5 or 10 years of fixed monthly payments

**$0** upfront

**5 or 10 years** contract

**Fixed monthly payments**, easy for your Finance team

**Own the system** after contract ends

**Free maintenance** included

**Guaranteed** energy performance

**One-stop solution** with a dedicated support team

Get a free quote

Power Purchase Agreement (PPA)

Zero upfront cost. Pay only for the solar electricity you use, at rates 40-70% cheaper than the grid

**\*$0** upfront

**10 to 20 years** contract

Up to **70% savings** on electricity

**Free maintenance** included

**Guaranteed** energy performance

**One-stop solution** with a dedicated support team

Learn more

Purchase

Pay upfront and and enjoy free solar energy for years to come

Starts from **~$50,000**(varies by system size)

**No** monthly payments

**Full ownership** from day one

**Optional** maintenance packages available

Get a free quote

## Commercial & Non-Residential Solar Panel Installation Process

Switching to clean energy is easier than you think. Our experienced team manages every step, from system design to post-installation support, ensuring a seamless transition and long-term energy savings for your business or property.

Step 1

Step 1

### Generate Your Free Solar Estimate

Use our solar calculator to estimate the optimal system size for your property. This tool shows potential cost savings and ROI by switching to solar, helping you make informed decisions.

Get your quote today

Step 2

Step 2

### Consult with a Solar Specialist

Our solar advisor will gather essential details about your energy usage and building layout. This allows us to design a system that aligns with your property’s specific needs and sustainability goals.

Step 3

Step 3

### Receive a Customised Solar Proposal

You’ll receive a comprehensive proposal outlining costs, energy savings, and ROI tailored to your property. Our specialist will walk you through every detail and answer all your questions.

Step 4

Step 4

### Confirmatory Site Survey and Contract Signing

A thorough site survey confirms installation details and system compatibility. We’ll finalise the contract for your review and e-signing, ensuring clarity on terms and expectations.

Step 5

Step 5

### Installation and Testing of Solar Panels

Our experienced team installs and tests your solar system, typically within 1-3 months. We ensure full regulatory compliance while minimising disruption to your operations.

Step 6

Step 6

### Start Generating Solar Power

Once operational, your system begins generating clean energy, leading to immediate energy cost reductions. Any excess power can be sold back to the grid via net metering, creating additional revenue.

Step 7

Step 7

### Post-Installation Maintenance and Support

For our Rent-To-Own (RTO) and Power Purchase Agreement (PPA) customers, we provide free ongoing maintenance to ensure optimal system performance. If you choose the upfront purchase option, you can select from tailored maintenance packages designed for long-term reliability and efficiency.

## Why Choose GetSolar?

### Personalised Solutions

We offer flexible solar plans that adapt to your property, including $0 upfront models, shorter contract terms, and reduced legal overhead. Unlike larger providers, we streamline onboarding so you can start saving faster.

### Hands-on Supervision

Your project is led by experienced solar engineers who manage the process end-to-end. No handoffs, no confusion, just reliable service from a dedicated team that treats your project like their own.

### Demonstrated Success & Competence

We’ve installed over 20MWp of solar capacity across Singapore and Malaysia. Our 5-star rating and portfolio of commercial projects reflect deep industry know-how. Plus, we’re backed by ENGIE, a global energy leader.

Fully transparentprocess**Premium Quality Products**

We prioritise long-term efficiency by using only Tier 1 commercial solar panels and inverters. Our expert team optimises installation to maximise energy output and cost savings, ensuring you get the most from your solar investment.

**Get your quote today**

Fully transparentprocess**Reliable Support Services**

Our dedicated team provides prompt and reliable post-installation maintenance, ensuring your commercial solar power system operates at peak efficiency throughout its lifespan.

**Get your quote today**

We believe in transparency, providing full details on costs and installation processes in your proposal. Our team is here to assist you in making the best decision for your commercial solar needs.

We’ve saved **thousands of dollars on electricity bills** each month & strongly recommend GetSolar to companies keen on **sustainability**.”

## Hear From our Customers

Kin Wah Lum

Mar 5, 2024

I have been considering install solar panel at my landed property. I chance on Getsolar website and consider their information and procedure / guide to obtain an estimate most easy and friendly. The website has a link to goggle map where roof orientation and size could be measured/ estimated. Getsolar respond almost instantly via what app and email to guide and discuss the scheme of things. What surpise me was the CEO (Mr Bolong) handles the discussion/ commerical and site visit. Very hand on. An initial estimate was issued within 2 days. The offer is well formulated and easy to understand. Site visit next day and a more optimal solution developed for a larger system. The whole process was a breeze for decision making. Opted for a 10.56 kwp system on 10 years rent to own basis( ie no upfront cost) which covers 10 years system performance guarantee and maintenance. Panels has a 30 years warranty. Looking forward to go green with GetSolar and saving on longer term basis.

## Frequently Asked Questions

Is it worth installing solar panels for my building?
In Singapore’s climate where it is sunny all year round, installing solar panels for your home can help you save energy and costs. However, how much you save is dependent on your roof size and site conditions. Find out how much you can potentially save with our solar calculator tool.

How is a Power Purchase Agreement different from a low-interest bank loan or instalment plan?
Although both options allow you to install solar without any significant upfront costs, there are some notable differences. With a bank loan or instalment plan, which you can get solar with little to no initial payment, you will incur interest charges and these plans would not cover any maintenance or repair costs required for your rooftop solar system over time.

On the other hand, a Power Purchase Agreement (PPA) allows you to enjoy savings as soon as your system is operational, with all capital expenditure or investment cost as well as operating costs absorbed by GetSolar. Under a solar PPA, your company simply pays a discounted tariff rate for your solar electricity and receive comprehensive maintenance and warranty coverage.

How do I get a Power Purchase Agreement?
Entering a power purchase agreement is easy with GetSolar. We provide flexibility in customisation by offering Power Purchase Agreement plans from 5 years up to 20 years, and curate our plans based on our customers needs. Request for a free solar assessment from our solar calculator, and our friendly sales specialists will reach out to share more about our plans and how you can benefit from them.

Are GetSolar Power Purchase Agreements (PPAs) worth it? How much money can I expect to save?
Absolutely! Solar Power Purchase Agreements in Singapore are designed to support companies as they transition to a more sustainable economy while saving them money.

Through the leasing of your roof space, this initiative provides you with access to a renewable energy source that is both eco-friendly and cost-effective. While the exact amount will vary, there are 3 main factors that determine how much money you can save by getting a PPA with GetSolar:

- Your property’s energy consumption amount and patterns
- Your current electricity retailer and utility rate
- The number of solar panels that your roof can accommodate

When you request a free quote **,** our sales specialists will work with you to assess your financial goals, energy consumption patterns and roof space to determine how much you can expect to save with GetSolar’s PPA plans

Higher and higher electricity bills? Turn your rooftop into long-term savings. GetSolar offers tailored solar panel installation for commercial and non-residential properties, all with $0 upfront cost, flexible ownership plans, and guaranteed performance.

Whether you manage a business, school, factory, or retail space, we help you make the switch to clean energy seamlessly and affordably.

Get your free quote

Flexible Solar Plans to Suit Your Property's Needs

Want to avoid upfront costs for solar installation on your commercial or non-residential property? With our Rent-to-Own (RTO) and Power Purchase Agreement (PPA) plans, you can enjoy immediate savings on your electricity bills, without any upfront payment. Prefer to own your system? Our upfront purchase option offers breakeven periods as short as 3 years!

Bestseller!
Rent-to-Own (RTO)
Zero upfront cost. Own the system after 5 or 10 years of fixed monthly payments

$0 upfront

5 or 10 years contract

Fixed monthly payments, easy for your Finance team

Own the system after contract ends

Free maintenance included

Guaranteed energy performance

One-stop solution with a dedicated support team

Get a free quote
Power Purchase Agreement (PPA)
Zero upfront cost. Pay only for the solar electricity you use, at rates 40-70% cheaper than the grid

*$0 upfront

10 to 20 years contract

Up to 70% savings on electricity

Free maintenance included

Guaranteed energy performance

One-stop solution with a dedicated support team

Learn more
Upfront
Purchase
Pay upfront and and enjoy free solar energy for years to come

Starts from ~$50,000 (varies by system size)

No monthly payments

Full ownership from day one

Optional maintenance packages available

Get a free quote

Commercial & Non-Residential Solar Panel Installation Process

Switching to clean energy is easier than you think. Our experienced team manages every step, from system design to post-installation support, ensuring a seamless transition and long-term energy savings for your business or property.

Step 1
Step 2
Step 3
Step 4
Step 5
Step 6
Step 7
Step 1
Step 1

Generate Your Free Solar Estimate

Use our solar calculator to estimate the optimal system size for your property. This tool shows potential cost savings and ROI by switching to solar, helping you make informed decisions.

Get your quote today
Step 2
Step 2

Consult with a Solar Specialist

Our solar advisor will gather essential details about your energy usage and building layout. This allows us to design a system that aligns with your property’s specific needs and sustainability goals.

Step 3
Step 3

Receive a Customised Solar Proposal

You’ll receive a comprehensive proposal outlining costs, energy savings, and ROI tailored to your property. Our specialist will walk you through every detail and answer all your questions.

Step 4
Step 4

Confirmatory Site Survey and Contract Signing

A thorough site survey confirms installation details and system compatibility. We’ll finalise the contract for your review and e-signing, ensuring clarity on terms and expectations.

Step 5
Step 5

Installation and Testing of Solar Panels

Our experienced team installs and tests your solar system, typically within 1-3 months. We ensure full regulatory compliance while minimising disruption to your operations.

Step 6
Step 6

Start Generating Solar Power

Once operational, your system begins generating clean energy, leading to immediate energy cost reductions. Any excess power can be sold back to the grid via net metering, creating additional revenue.

Step 7
Step 7

Post-Installation Maintenance and Support

For our Rent-To-Own (RTO) and Power Purchase Agreement (PPA) customers, we provide free ongoing maintenance to ensure optimal system performance. If you choose the upfront purchase option, you can select from tailored maintenance packages designed for long-term reliability and efficiency.

Why Choose GetSolar?

Personalised Solutions

We offer flexible solar plans that adapt to your property, including $0 upfront models, shorter contract terms, and reduced legal overhead. Unlike larger providers, we streamline onboarding so you can start saving faster.

Hands-on Supervision

Your project is led by experienced solar engineers who manage the process end-to-end. No handoffs, no confusion, just reliable service from a dedicated team that treats your project like their own.

Demonstrated Success & Competence

We’ve installed over 20MWp of solar capacity across Singapore and Malaysia. Our 5-star rating and portfolio of commercial projects reflect deep industry know-how. Plus, we’re backed by ENGIE, a global energy leader.

Premium Quality Products

We prioritise long-term efficiency by using only Tier 1 commercial solar panels and inverters. Our expert team optimises installation to maximise energy output and cost savings, ensuring you get the most from your solar investment.

Get your quote today

Reliable Support Services

Our dedicated team provides prompt and reliable post-installation maintenance, ensuring your commercial solar power system operates at peak efficiency throughout its lifespan.

Get your quote today

Fully Transparent Process

We believe in transparency, providing full details on costs and installation processes in your proposal. Our team is here to assist you in making the best decision for your commercial solar needs.

Get your quote today

Get a free quote

Trusted by Leading Businesses

Fragrance Foodstuff Pte Ltd

“GetSolar helped us implement our initial solar panel project, and we are extremely satisfied with how they managed it, which is why we have re-engaged them for an extension. We’ve saved thousands of dollars on electricity bills each month & strongly recommend GetSolar to companies keen on sustainability.”

-
Eddie Teo, IT Manager

F&B Manufacturing

252 kWp
No. of Panels:
443
Completion Year:
2024
123

Hear From our Customers

Kin Wah Lum
Mar 5, 2024
I have been considering install solar panel at my landed property. I chance on Getsolar website and consider their information and procedure / guide to obtain an estimate most easy and friendly. The website has a link to goggle map where roof orientation and size could be measured/ estimated. Getsolar respond almost instantly via what app and email to guide and discuss the scheme of things. What surpise me was the CEO (Mr Bolong) handles the discussion/ commerical and site visit. Very hand on. An initial estimate was issued within 2 days. The offer is well formulated and easy to understand. Site visit next day and a more optimal solution developed for a larger system. The whole process was a breeze for decision making. Opted for a 10.56 kwp system on 10 years rent to own basis( ie no upfront cost) which covers 10 years system performance guarantee and maintenance. Panels has a 30 years warranty. Looking forward to go green with GetSolar and saving on longer term basis.

Frequently Asked Questions

Is it worth installing solar panels for my building?

In Singapore’s climate where it is sunny all year round, installing solar panels for your home can help you save energy and costs. However, how much you save is dependent on your roof size and site conditions. Find out how much you can potentially save with our solar calculator tool.

How is a Power Purchase Agreement different from a low-interest bank loan or instalment plan?

Although both options allow you to install solar without any significant upfront costs, there are some notable differences. With a bank loan or instalment plan, which you can get solar with little to no initial payment, you will incur interest charges and these plans would not cover any maintenance or repair costs required for your rooftop solar system over time.

On the other hand, a Power Purchase Agreement (PPA) allows you to enjoy savings as soon as your system is operational, with all capital expenditure or investment cost as well as operating costs absorbed by GetSolar. Under a solar PPA, your company simply pays a discounted tariff rate for your solar electricity and receive comprehensive maintenance and warranty coverage.

How do I get a Power Purchase Agreement?

Entering a power purchase agreement is easy with GetSolar. We provide flexibility in customisation by offering Power Purchase Agreement plans from 5 years up to 20 years, and curate our plans based on our customers needs. Request for a free solar assessment from our solar calculator, and our friendly sales specialists will reach out to share more about our plans and how you can benefit from them.

Are GetSolar Power Purchase Agreements (PPAs) worth it? How much money can I expect to save?

Absolutely! Solar Power Purchase Agreements in Singapore are designed to support companies as they transition to a more sustainable economy while saving them money.

Through the leasing of your roof space, this initiative provides you with access to a renewable energy source that is both eco-friendly and cost-effective. While the exact amount will vary, there are 3 main factors that determine how much money you can save by getting a PPA with GetSolar:

  • Your property’s energy consumption amount and patterns
  • Your current electricity retailer and utility rate
  • The number of solar panels that your roof can accommodate

When you request a free quote, our sales specialists will work with you to assess your financial goals, energy consumption patterns and roof space to determine how much you can expect to save with GetSolar’s PPA plans

Ready to Go Solar?

Contact us

If you have any inquiries or need support, our team of cheerful solar elves is here to assist you! Reach out to us on WhatsApp or drop us a message at support@getsolar.ai, and we’ll be at your service!

# Solar Panels for Homes in Singapore

Unlock Energy Savings with Trusted Solar Solutions

Install solar panels for your home in Singapore with zero upfront costs through our Rent-To-Own program or make an upfront purchase. Save energy and reduce bills with expert solar panel installation.

Get your free quote

## Flexible Pricing Plans for Residential Solar Panel Installation

Ready to embrace solar panels for your home? Enjoy the flexibility to opt for either the two plans available: Rent-To-Own or an upfront purchase. This way, you can choose the best financial option that fits your needs while you switch to clean energy. Learn more about our solar leasing plans below.

Rent-To-Own

10-year plan

From

/ month

Get a free quote

Purchase

From

Pay upfront and own your system to enjoy free solar energy

From **$20,000** upfront

Own the system **immediately**

**1 – 2 years** **workmanship** warranty with **no** performance guarantee

**$500/visit** annual maintenance charge

Get a free quote

## Hassle-Free Solar Panel Installation for Your Home

Installing solar panels in Singapore is simpler than you might imagine. With just a few clicks, you’re on your way to getting solar for your home. As a leading solar panel company in Singapore, our skilled team will ensure a smooth process, from the initial application to the installation and ongoing maintenance of your solar panels.

Step 1

Step 2

Step 3

Step 4

Step 5

Step 6

Step 7

Step 1

Step 1

### Generate A Solar Estimate

Start your journey by using our solar calculator to receive a preliminary recommendation of your rooftop solar panel system, based on your roof size, electricity usage and metre configuration. With GetSolar’s solar calculator, receive an instant solar quote and calculate your solar savings when you switch to solar energy.

Get your quote today

Step 2

Step 2

### Consult with a Solar Specialist

After receiving your solar estimate, our solar sales advisors will reach out to gather any additional information and documents needed to design a customised solar panel proposal for your home.

Step 3

Step 3

### Receive a Solar Proposal

Next, you can expect to receive a customised solar panel proposal in your email inbox. On the online advisory call, our sales specialist will guide you through the GetSolar Rent-to-own solar proposal, providing expert advice and answering any questions you have about solar along the way.

Step 4

Step 4

### Confirmatory Site Survey and Contract Signing

Once you express interest in the solar offer, we will conduct a confirmatory site survey to ensure your home is ready for installation and firm up any remaining details. Following this, you will receive an e-signing agreement for your review and confirmation.

Step 5

Step 5

### Installation and Commissioning of Solar Panels

Upon confirmation, our team will initiate the installation process. Once your solar panels and solar inverters are delivered, on-site installation is typically completed within 3 to 5 days . Our team will handle all electrical submissions to SP Group, and once approved, a Licensed Electrical Worker (LEW) will then conduct testing and commissioning before turning on the solar PV system.

Step 6

Step 6

### Start Generating Solar Power

Once certified for operations, you can turn the system on, generating solar power for your household! Any solar energy generated from your solar panel system will now offset your day-time electricity usage, with any excess solar energy being sold back to the grid, and paid out directly into your utility account!

Step 7

Step 7

### Post-Installation Maintenance and Support

Our dedicated team ensures the continued performance and efficiency of your solar panel system through daily remote monitoring of your system as well as routine inspections. These inspections are free for those enrolled in the Rent-To-Own program, while customers who selected the upfront purchase plan will incur a small fee.

## Why GetSolar is Your Top Choice for Solar Panel Installation

**Expert Solar Solutions**

With extensive knowledge of solar energy and cutting-edge solar panel technology, our team of experts is poised to deliver the right solution for your home. We use only Tier 1 solar panels and inverters for our systems, which are the most popular globally.

Learn more

**Responsive and Reliable Service**

Our specialists are prompt in addressing any inquiries and are always ready to handle your servicing needs. We always make sure your home is 100% suitable for solar before going ahead with any project.

View case studies

**No Hidden Installation Costs**

We prioritise transparency and honesty. Every cost associated with your solar installation project will be meticulously detailed in the proposal, helping you navigate each stage of the process with confidence and peace of mind.

Get a free solar quote now

## Hear From our Customers

Poh-Lin Tan

Feb 10, 2025

We are so glad we found this company GetSolar! This is a definite 5 super stars experience. From the quotation, site visit, organizing installation, coordinating first works with our preferred dates/ times, re-scheduling start date, installation works, to after installation, everything went smoothly and seamlessly. And I was so surprised that our side porch where all the materials laid and the workers accessed the roof was cleaner than before they started after all the works! I am totally impressed. Shout out to Kai Qi, Vez, Lynn, Hannan Roy and his teams of wonderful workers. We are so pleased to see the solar panels on our roof - aesthetically placed and a sight to behold knowing we can harness the power of the sun and give back a little to earth! Thank you, GetSolar! Way to go!

Peng Zhang

Feb 4, 2025

Patient and detailed for project estimation and quotation. The package is quite attractive with great ROI.

Previous PageNext Page1 2 3 4

## Frequently Asked Questions

Is it worth installing solar panels for my home?

In short, yes! Solar panels are a win-win: you save on electricity bills and get paid for the clean energy you contribute back to the grid. Additionally, you’re helping the planet.

In Singapore’s climate where it is sunny all year round, installing solar panels for your home can help you save energy and costs. However, how much you save is dependent on your roof size and site conditions. Find out how much you can potentially save with our solar calculator tool.

Can I install solar panels on my HDB / Condo / MCST property?

HDB owners, unfortunately, cannot install solar panels on their roofs.

Condo and MCST properties are able to install solar panels on their roofs, however, there are certain restrictions in place because of communal living rules. If you own a penthouse or a strata-landed home and wish to install solar panels, here is what you need to know:

- You will need to seek approval from your your Management Corporation Strata Title (MCST).
- You will not be able to export or sell any excess electricity to the grid, due to limitations of a master-sub meter structure in such developments
- The solar system installed will be considered a “hobby” system and you may be liable for any risks to the building.

Will my solar panels work at night and on cloudy days?

Solar panels are designed to convert sunlight into energy, so even during cloudy days, you’ll still expect your solar system to be generating between 40-80% of the electricity compared to a sunny day. However, when there is no longer any sunlight during the night, the inverter on your solar panel system will automatically power off, before it powers on again in the early morning.

In any case, don’t worry! When your solar panels are taking a break, your home automatically switches to drawing electricity from the grid to keep things running smoothly. The lights will stay on, day or night!

Is my rooftop suitable for a solar panel installation?

In sunny Singapore, most rooftops are a great match for solar panels. However, if your roof is super steep or has a complex design with multiple angles or dormer windows, it might not be the smoothest fit for a solar panel system.These unique roof features can make panel placement a bit tricky due to limited space, and it might even add some extra costs. So while most roofs are a-ok, it’s always a good idea to have our GetSolar pros take a look to make sure it’s feasible for your specific roof. Simply reach out to us on WhatsApp or send in an enquiry from our solar calculator and our team can advise you further!

What happens to my Rent-to-Own system if I sell my house or move out?

If you sell your home or move out, there are a few options depending on your Rent-to-Own agreement. Typically, you can transfer the agreement to the new homeowner (subject to their consent and eligibility), pay off the remaining balance to own the system outright, or request a relocation (subject to technical and cost assessments). Please contact our team early in your moving process so we can advise you on the best approach.

## Ready to Go Solar?

Contact us

If you have any inquiries or need support, our team of cheerful solar elves is here to assist you! Reach out to us on WhatsApp or drop us a messag eat support@getsolar.ai, and we’ll be at your service!

data.markdown:
Renewable Energy Certificates (RECs) in Singapore

Sell Renewable Energy Certificates (RECs) effortlessly with GetSolar! Optimise your solar energy system’s potential, shorten your breakeven period, and unlock additional income by selling RECs at competitive prices.

MORE DETAILS ON RECs

## What Are Renewable Energy Certificates (RECs)?

Renewable Energy Certificates (or RECs, in short) represent the environmental benefits of generating one megawatt-hour (MWh) of electricity from renewable sources like solar. By producing clean energy, your solar system generates RECs, which can be sold to companies to help them meet their sustainability targets. These certificates provide a way for solar system owners to maximise their investment by participating in the growing demand for clean energy solutions.

Learn More About REC pricing

## Why Sell Renewable Energy Certificates in Singapore?

Selling your Renewable Energy Certificates (RECs) in Singapore offers an excellent way to earn additional income while supporting the renewable energy market. REC prices fluctuate based on market conditions, giving you the opportunity to capitalise on growing demand.

There are two international registries which are recognised in Singapore. The International REC Standard (or I-REC), as well as APX (with RECs issued known as TIGR - Tradable Instrument for Global Renewables).

**REC Pricing in Singapore (2025):**

Small to medium solar system owners can sell RECs for **S$30 to $50** per certificate, with potential earnings of **SGD $500 to $1000 annually**. On top of that, selling RECs earn you additional cash and does not affect your energy consumption or how much you are paid for your solar exports. Prices of I-REC or TIGR RECs in Singapore are usually similar.

Whether you’re looking to sell RECs or are interested in the renewable energy certificate price, selling RECs helps you reduce your solar investment breakeven period by **6 to 12 months**.

## The Renewable Energy Certificate (REC)   Selling Process with GetSolar

GetSolar simplifies the entire process of selling Renewable Energy Certificates (RECs), ensuring you can monetise your solar energy efficiently. Our service includes everything from registering your solar system to finding buyers.

### Seller

You generate RECs as a solar asset owner.

### GetSolar

We handle registration of your system and energy generation, absorb all registry level fees and help you to sell your RECs.

### Buyers

Businesses buy RECs to meet sustainability goals.

Get in touch with Us

## How to Sell Renewable Energy Certificates (RECs) with GetSolar

At GetSolar, we follow strict guidelines set by international REC registries like APX or I-REC to ensure compliance and transparency. Here’s the step-by-step process to sell your Renewable Energy Certificates (RECs) with us:

Step 1

Step 2

Step 3

Step 4

Step 5

Step 6

Step 1

Step 1

### Reach out via email contact us directly.

Start Selling Your RECs

Step 2

Step 2

### Provide your solar system registration documents.

Step 3

Step 3

### Give us authorisation to manage and sell your RECs.

Step 4

Step 4

### We will register your asset with international registries.

Step 5

Step 5

### Twice a year, we register the clean energy you generate as RECs.

Step 6

Step 6

### Receive regular cash payouts directly to your bank account once your RECs are issued and sold.

## Why Choose GetSolar?

### No Hidden Costs

With GetSolar, we absorb all registration or transaction fees charged by I-REC or APX, so you don’t need to worry about hidden fees. Simply authorise us to manage your RECs, and you’ll enjoy consistent cash payouts from your REC sales.

### Hassle-Free Process

We handle everything, from registering your solar system to finding buyers, so you don’t have to figure this out yourself. With over 300 solar systems under management and selling RECs since early 2022, we take the hard work off your hands.

### Consistent Payouts

Get regular cash payouts twice a year. Our commitment to fixed prices ensures your earnings remain predictable, regardless of market fluctuations.

## Hear From our Customers

Christian Munther

Jan 3, 2025

GetSolar first piqued my interest through their tech-enabled approach. Rather than having to call multiple installers to come down for a site visit before committing to a quote, I simply selected “my” house on a google maps interface and was immediately provided an indication of how much energy solar panels could generate. This instant datapoint was swiftly followed up by an emailed proposal, customised to my property, and best of all, offered various financing options including a rent-to-own, where any potential issues during the contract period would be fully handled by GetSolar, giving peace of mind. The installation was admirably quick, and carried out by a well-oiled team who did a great job. True professionals. Everything has been super straightforward, with all paperwork to get the panel installation certified by SP Service handled by GetSolar. Overall, a great customer experience and can’t recommend Sam and her team enough.

Charlotte Tan

Dec 17, 2024

The whole process was seamless and efficient. The team was knowledgeable and very responsive. The team made the switch to solar seamless and easy!

Previous PageNext Page1 2 3

## Frequently Asked Questions

What are Renewable Energy Certificates (RECs)?\
A renewable energy certificate (REC) validates and quantifies the environmental benefits of generating electricity from renewable sources. It allows individuals and businesses to claim that a portion of their electricity consumption came from renewables, which supports their efforts to promote sustainability and reduce their carbon footprint.

RECs are also used by entities to comply with regulatory requirements and voluntary standards related to renewable energy targets. Financially, RECs provide revenue for renewable energy producers, promoting investment in renewable energy projects and technologies.

Are RECs different if I am under SP Group compared to other electricity retailers?\\
No, RECs are the same regardless of your electricity retailer. These certificates are generated according to the amount of renewable energy produced by your solar panels and are issued by international registries such as the I-REC Standard or TIGR by APX.

Why sell Renewable Energy Certificates in Singapore?\\
When you sell RECs in Singapore, you unlock an extra stream of annual income. This extra cash can potentially shorten the time it takes to recoup your solar investment by approximately 6-12 months, bringing your breakeven point even closer.

The value of RECs is typically subject to market fluctuations based on supply and demand. As of early-2025, small or medium asset owners can expect to receive between S$30 to $50 for each REC sold, while prices for commercial solar owners differ based on system size. This means that the average solar homeowner can earn an extra S$500 to $800 every year!

Reach out to the GetSolar team on WhatsApp or email us at recs@getsolar.ai to find out more!

Are there any requirements to fulfil in order to sell RECs?\\
In order to sell RECs generated by your solar system, you’l need to register and verify your solar assets with international REC registries. You can reach out to us via WhatsApp or email recs@getsolar.ai and our team would be happy to help you with the process and unlock this additional stream of revenue for you today!

## Ready to Go Solar?

Contact us

If you have any inquiries or need support, our team of cheerful solar elves is here to assist you! Reach out to us on WhatsApp or drop us a messageat support@getsolar.ai, and we’ll be at your service!

The value of RECs is typically subject to market fluctuations based on supply and demand. As of early-2025, small or medium asset owners can expect to receive between S$30 to $50 for each REC sold, while prices for commercial solar owners differ based on system size. This means that the average solar homeowner can earn an extra S$500 to $800 every year!

Reach out to the GetSolar team on WhatsApp or email us at recs@getsolar.ai to find out more!

Are there any requirements to fulfil in order to sell RECs?

In order to sell RECs generated by your solar system, you’l need to register and verify your solar assets with international REC registries. You can reach out to us via WhatsApp or email recs@getsolar.ai and our team would be happy to help you with the process and unlock this additional stream of revenue for you today!

Ready to Go Solar?

Contact us

If you have any inquiries or need support, our team of cheerful solar elves is here to assist you! Reach out to us on WhatsApp or drop us a messageat support@getsolar.ai, and we’ll be at your service!

Installing Solar PV Systems

Enjoy substantial savings with your very own PV system, while actively contributing to a greener planet.

Get your free quote

## How Do Solar PV Systems Work?

Solar PV systems work by converting sunlight into electricity through the photovoltaic effect, using solar panels and an solar inverter to generate usable power for homes and businesses.

[iframe](//cdn.embedly.com/widgets/media.html?src=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fembed%2FJdqA5D15S1A%3Ffeature%3Doembed&display_name=YouTube&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.youtube.com%2Fwatch%3Fv%3DJdqA5D15S1A&image=https%3A%2F%2Fi.ytimg.com%2Fvi%2FJdqA5D15S1A%2Fhqdefault.jpg&type=text%2Fhtml&schema=youtube)

Learn more

## Solar PV System Installation Process

With GetSolar, you can Experience the simplicity of installing solar panels with GetSolar – a click of a button sets you on the path to enjoy solar panels for your home. Our team of experts will ensure a seamless journey from application to installation, coupled with ongoing maintenance for your solar panels.easily enjoy cost savings while saving the planet.Our team of experts will ensure that your installation is executed with precision and care.

Step 1

Step 2

Step 3

Step 4

Step 5

Step 6

Step 7

Step 1

Step 1

### Generate A Solar Estimate

Start your journey by using our solar calculator to receive a preliminary recommendation of your rooftop solar panel system, based on your roof size, electricity usage and metre configuration. With GetSolar’s solar calculator, receive an instant solar quote and calculate your solar savings when you switch to solar energy.

Get your quote today

Step 2

Step 2

### Consult with a Solar Specialist

After receiving your solar estimate, our solar sales advisors will reach out to gather any additional information and documents needed to design a customised solar panel proposal for your home.

Step 3

Step 3

### Receive a Solar Proposal

Next, you can expect to receive a customised solar panel proposal in your email inbox. On the online advisory call, our sales specialist will guide you through the GetSolar Rent-to-own solar proposal, providing expert advice and answering any questions you have about solar along the way.

Step 4

Step 4

### Confirmatory Site Survey and Contract Signing

Once you express interest in the solar offer, we will conduct a confirmatory site survey to ensure your home is ready for installation and firm up any remaining details. Following this, you will receive an e-signing agreement for your review and confirmation.

Step 5

Step 5

### Installation and Commissioning of Solar Panels

Upon confirmation, our team will initiate the installation process. Once your solar panels and solar inverters are delivered, on-site installation is typically completed within 3 to 5 days . Our team will handle all electrical submissions to SP Group, and once approved, a Licensed Electrical Worker (LEW) will then conduct testing and commissioning before turning on the solar PV system.

Step 6

Step 6

### Start Generating Solar Power

Once certified for operations, you can turn the system on, generating solar power for your household! Any solar energy generated from your solar panel system will now offset your day-time electricity usage, with any excess solar energy being sold back to the grid, and paid out directly into your utility account!

Step 7

Step 7

### Post-Installation Maintenance and Support

Our dedicated team ensures the continued performance and efficiency of your solar panel system through daily remote monitoring of your system as well as routine inspections. These inspections are free for those enrolled in the Rent-To-Own program, while customers who selected the upfront purchase plan will incur a small fee.

## Types of Solar Plans at GetSolar

We are a leading and trusted solar panel company in Singapore, with an unwavering commitment to offering value plans to meet the needs of both homeowners and businesses.

### Solar for Homes

Go solar for your home with Singapore’s first Rent-To-Own solar programme or opt for an upfront purchase plan.

Explore

### Solar for Businesses

Embrace sustainability for your business through a Power Purchase Agreement (PPA) or an upfront purchase plan.

Explore

## Why Choose Solar Panels in Singapore?

The cost of your solar panel system depends on the size of your roof and the number of solar panels you install. Here’s what to expect from GetSolar solutions.

### Experienced   Team of Solar Experts

Count on our team of experts armed with the right knowledge to assist you in making well-informed decisions. Furthermore, we are dedicated to guaranteeing the longevity and optimal performance of your solar PV system for the entire duration of your contract.

### Efficient and  Transparent Process

Our sales specialists are known for their swift responses. Your inquiries will be addressed within 3 to 5 business days. Additionally, we prioritise transparent communication – your contract will outline all project details and costs, with no hidden fees.

### Save and   Earn Simultaneously

Anticipate saving up to 70% on your monthly electricity bills by harnessing the power of solar energy. In addition to these savings from your chosen solar plan, dive into potential earning opportunities with our Renewable Energy Certificate (REC) programme.

Get in touch with Us

## Ready to Go Solar?

Contact us

If you have any inquiries or need support, our team of cheerful solar elves is here to assist you! Reach out to us on WhatsApp or drop us a messageat support@getsolar.ai, and we’ll be at your service!
